title: bansivAlE
sahitya:
bansivAlE nE man mOha


caraNam 1    bOli bOlE mIthi lAgE dardar umang karAvE
    caraNam 2    bENan bAjE tAn gAvE nisadin gOpiyAn rijhAvE
    caraNam 3    sAmvarO rang mOhanI ang sumaran tan ki bhulAvE
    caraNam 4    kALindI kE tIr ThADhE mOhan bAnsuri bajAvE
    caraNam 5    padmanAbh prabhu dInabandhu aur nar caran manAvE
